page.description: Used to create Editor Sets for the FormView Control.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Editor]* container is a special type of container used to create editors for in an Editor Set. This container *[must]* be contained inside an [EditorSet] container.

The *[ui:Editor]* container is used in mobile applications for creating an interface for editing the value in a control, displaying a separate editor for the control rather than editing the control directly.
